author: Vect0r
install_msg: Thanks for installing VidChoose! Set your YouTube API key with `[p]vidchoose setapi` first.
name: VidChoose
short: YouTube video selector with weighted random selection
description: Automatically posts YouTube videos from added channels with weighted random selection and repeat avoidance.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores YouTube channel/video IDs and user preferences for video selection. No personal user data is stored.
